root.name: Moon Crystal
root.description: OverviewMoon Crystal is an action platformer developed by Hector about a green haired boy named Ricky Slater on his mission to save his father from Count Crimson. The game was published for the Famicom on August 28, 1992 and was never released outside of Japan. An unofficial translation patch was created by Alex W. Jackson that was released on April 2, 2000.
